name: Rusty Sickle (2h)
data: It has superb weapon class for its type (impressive in general).
It increases the users strength pathetically.
It increases the users dexterity pathetically.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'brawl'.
It does asphyxiation damage like a god.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'critical'.
This weapon can strangle an opponent.
